{{ModId}}_BigBurger.Name: {{ModId}}_BigBurger
{{ModId}}_BigBurger.Description: A big burger from Zuzu City. The meat is tender and juicy.

{{ModId}}_BLT.Name: {{ModId}}_BLT
{{ModId}}_BLT.Description: A delicious sandwich; a combination of bacon, lettuce, tomato and some mayonnaise.

{{ModId}}_ChickenDrumstick.Name: {{ModId}}_ChickenDrumstick
{{ModId}}_ChickenDrumstick.Description: A large leg of chicken. It looks very nice.

{{ModId}}_ChocolateSlice.Name: {{ModId}}_ChocolateSlice
{{ModId}}_ChocolateSlice.Description: A slice of chocolate cake with a shiny red cherry on the top.

{{ModId}}_Cider.Name: {{ModId}}_Cider
{{ModId}}_Cider.Description: A bottle of crisp apple cider. It looks lovely.

{{ModId}}_DowntownDog.Name: {{ModId}}_DowntownDog
{{ModId}}_DowntownDog.Description: A yummy hot dog from Zuzu City, it looks delicious!

{{ModId}}_GranaryStack.Name: {{ModId}}_GranaryStack
{{ModId}}_GranaryStack.Description: A nice stack of lettuce, tomato and chicken on a loaf of granary bread.

{{ModId}}_IceDelight.Name: {{ModId}}_IceDelight
{{ModId}}_IceDelight.Description: A bowl of cool vanilla ice cream, topped with a drizzle of raspberry sauce.

{{ModId}}_JojaCocktail.Name: {{ModId}}_JojaCocktail
{{ModId}}_JojaCocktail.Description: A bright blue cocktail. It looks bad for you, but who cares?

{{ModId}}_JojaFries.Name: {{ModId}}_JojaFries
{{ModId}}_JojaFries.Description: A salty tub of potato fries. They're swimming with grease.

{{ModId}}_JojaSoda.Name: {{ModId}}_JojaSoda
{{ModId}}_JojaSoda.Description: A draught version of Joja Cola. It also has a bit more sweetness to it.

{{ModId}}_LemonDrizzleCheesecake.Name: {{ModId}}_LemonDrizzleCheesecake
{{ModId}}_LemonDrizzleCheesecake.Description: A lemon curd cheesecake with a shortbread base. Tangy!

{{ModId}}_MozzarellaSlice.Name: {{ModId}}_MozzarellaSlice
{{ModId}}_MozzarellaSlice.Description: A slice of mozzarella pizza with various toppings. The cheese is nice and stringy.

{{ModId}}_QiCrystal.Name: {{ModId}}_QiCrystal
{{ModId}}_QiCrystal.Description: A crystal with exceptionally strong energy. It appears to be comprised of prismatic shards and diamonds, bound together.

{{ModId}}_SerpentFragment.Name: {{ModId}}_SerpentFragment
{{ModId}}_SerpentFragment.Description: A strange scale-like fragment dropped by the mighty beasts inside the Zuzu Desert cave. There's a strange energy emanating from it.

{{ModId}}_StrawberryDaiquiri.Name: {{ModId}}_StrawberryDaiquiri
{{ModId}}_StrawberryDaiquiri.Description: A red, very strong 'alcohol smoothie'. It looks absolutely delicious.

{{ModId}}_ZuzuChampagne.Name: {{ModId}}_ZuzuChampagne
{{ModId}}_ZuzuChampagne.Description: A bottle of pink, perfumey champagne. Why not treat yourself?

{{ModId}}_ZuzuIceCream.Name: {{ModId}}_ZuzuIceCream
{{ModId}}_ZuzuIceCream.Description: A cone of pink Zuzu Ice Cream - a very popular flavour, with an indescribably sweet taste.

{{ModId}}_ZuzuMilkshake.Name: {{ModId}}_ZuzuMilkshake
{{ModId}}_ZuzuMilkshake.Description: A milkshake from Zuzu City. It is very popular, due to its thick, creamy consistency and flavour!

{{ModId}}_ZuzuSignatureCocktail.Name: {{ModId}}_ZuzuSignatureCocktail
{{ModId}}_ZuzuSignatureCocktail.Description: A neon pink cocktail. You don't know what's in it, but it looks damn tasty.

{{ModId}}_SpanishLime.Name: {{ModId}}_SpanishLime
{{ModId}}_SpanishLime.Description: An exotic fruit growable only on tropical islands. It has a sweet yet tangy flavour to it.

{{ModId}}_Jackfruit.Name: {{ModId}}_Jackfruit
{{ModId}}_Jackfruit.Description: An exotic fruit growable only on tropical islands. It's rich in nutrients and fiber.

{{ModId}}_Araza.Name: {{ModId}}_Araza
{{ModId}}_Araza.Description: An exotic fruit growable only on tropical islands. It has a very sour and bittersweet flavour to it.

{{ModId}}_Ackee.Name: {{ModId}}_Ackee
{{ModId}}_Ackee.Description: An exotic fruit growable only on tropical islands. A relative of the lychee, with a delicate, nutty flavour.

{{ModId}}_Cherimoya.Name: {{ModId}}_Cherimoya
{{ModId}}_Cherimoya.Description: An exotic fruit growable only on tropical islands. A light and refreshing fruit, reminiscent of a fruit salad.

{{ModId}}_Earth'sEssence.Name: {{ModId}}_Earth'sEssence
{{ModId}}_Earth'sEssence.Description: A tough crystalline cluster of minerals with a forest green sheen to them. They have a certain aura of being connected to nature itself.

{{ModId}}_LotusCrystal.Name: {{ModId}}_LotusCrystal
{{ModId}}_LotusCrystal.Description: A delicate crystal in the shape of a lotus flower. It's very beautiful.

{{ModId}}_Moonstone.Name: {{ModId}}_Moonstone
{{ModId}}_Moonstone.Description: The texture of it reminds you of a diamond, but the colours are a deeper, more pearlescent blue.

{{ModId}}_Stargazer'sOre.Name: {{ModId}}_Stargazer'sOre
{{ModId}}_Stargazer'sOre.Description: It's like a geode of deep blue crystal. It shimmers with the glow of the night sky.

{{ModId}}_SunsetFragment.Name: {{ModId}}_SunsetFragment
{{ModId}}_SunsetFragment.Description: A chunk of infernal crystal, forged in the depths of the Earth's core.

{{ModId}}_SapphireStarfish.Name: {{ModId}}_SapphireStarfish
{{ModId}}_SapphireStarfish.Description: A small starfish resembling a sapphire crystal. It can only be caught in the mysterious depths of the Zuzu Oasis Caverns.

{{ModId}}_ZuzuCarp.Name: {{ModId}}_ZuzuCarp
{{ModId}}_ZuzuCarp.Description: A strange purple-pink version of the carp. It seems to have 2 extra fins.

{{ModId}}_Angelfish.Name: {{ModId}}_Angelfish
{{ModId}}_Angelfish.Description: These fish grow to be quite large, and they fetch quite a price. They only inhabit exceptionally tropical habitats.

{{ModId}}_Clownfish.Name: {{ModId}}_Clownfish
{{ModId}}_Clownfish.Description: Clownfish are social fish, living in anemones with their own 'families'. They don't, however, tell jokes and make balloon animals.

{{ModId}}_FireJellyfish.Name: {{ModId}}_FireJellyfish
{{ModId}}_FireJellyfish.Description: Fire Jellyfish are dastardly little sea dwellers, feeding off of other jellyfish, but also fish fry. They can let out poison if irritated, too.

{{ModId}}_MarineDragon.Name: {{ModId}}_MarineDragon
{{ModId}}_MarineDragon.Description: A relative of the seahorse, the marine dragon is an exotic fish that is rarely found frequenting tropical archipelagoes.

{{ModId}}_MarineGold.Name: {{ModId}}_MarineGold
{{ModId}}_MarineGold.Description: A special fish with a golden sheen coated upon its pearlescent scales. It's a tricky fish, only found in hot climates.

{{ModId}}_VampireSquid.Name: {{ModId}}_VampireSquid
{{ModId}}_VampireSquid.Description: A cephalopod found in extreme deep sea environments, but for some unknown reason, it comes to near surface in hot and humid regions.

{{ModId}}_BubblegumIceCream.Name: {{ModId}}_BubblegumIceCream
{{ModId}}_BubblegumIceCream.Description: A brightly-coloured cone of Bubblegum Ice Cream Cone - a popular flavour, due to its sweetness!

{{ModId}}_StrawberryPopsicle.Name: {{ModId}}_StrawberryPopsicle
{{ModId}}_StrawberryPopsicle.Description: A block of strawberry flavoured ice on a wooden stick. It's sweet.

{{ModId}}_ChocolateIceCream.Name: {{ModId}}_ChocolateIceCream
{{ModId}}_ChocolateIceCream.Description: A delicious cone of chocolate flavoured ice cream cone. It's a refreshing treat, perfect for a hot day.

{{ModId}}_Popcorn.Name: {{ModId}}_Popcorn
{{ModId}}_Popcorn.Description: A delicious, salty snack. Great to eat while watching a movie! There's a couple un-popped kernels in the bottom.

{{ModId}}_QiBlade.Name: {{ModId}}_QiBlade
{{ModId}}_QiBlade.Description: A mysterious dagger given to you by Mr Qi. It feels... as if it were from another dimension.

{{ModId}}_Serpent'sSmallsword.Name: {{ModId}}_Serpent'sSmallsword
{{ModId}}_Serpent'sSmallsword.Description: An odd weapon Qi made for you by combining fragments dropped by a deadly beast. The blade seems to have a golden glow.

{{ModId}}_ZuzuUniversityJersey.Name: {{ModId}}_ZuzuUniversityJersey
{{ModId}}_ZuzuUniversityJersey.Description: The flagship jersey of Zuzu University's Gridball team.

Changes.Target: Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Big Burger, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/BLT, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Bubblegum Ice Cream, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Chicken Drumstick, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Chocolate Ice Cream, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Chocolate Slice, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Cider, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Downtown Dog, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Granary Stack, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Ice Delight, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Joja Fries, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Joja Cocktail, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Serpent Fragment, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Joja Soda, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Lemon Drizzle Cheesecake, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Mozzarella Slice, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Popcorn, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Qi Crystal, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Sapphire Starfish, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Strawberry Daiquiri, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Strawberry Popsicle, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Zuzu Carp, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Zuzu Champagne, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Zuzu Ice Cream, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Zuzu Milkshake, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Zuzu Signature Cocktail, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Ackee, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Araza, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Cherimoya, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Earth's Essence, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Jackfruit, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Lotus Crystal, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Moonstone, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Spanish Lime, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Stargazer's Ore, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Sunset Fragment, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Angelfish, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Clownfish, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Fire Jellyfish, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Marine Dragon, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Marine Gold, Mods/{{ModId}}/Items/Vampire Squid
